example.text: To address this, I introduced the Agricultural Foreign Investment Transparency Act to address the national security threat of foreign adversaries buying up US agricultural land. I am proud to shine a light on the malign influence of the Chinese and our other foreign adversaries who are buying up our land, undermining our farmers, and threatening our nation's security.

Protecting the St. Lawrence River and Lake Champlain I'm proud to work to ensure our natural ecosystems in Upstate New York and the North Country are protected for generations to come. As a senior member on the House Armed Services Committee, I worked to include bipartisan St. Lawrence River and Great Lakes Waterways Protection Act and key provisions to protect Lake Champlain from invasive species were included and passed in the final version of the National Defense Authorization Act (NDAA).

New York Post: Critics demand probe of NY AG Letitia James: 'People will doubt her integrity' Homeland Preparedness: Legislation seeks to support CBP personnel behavioral health Press-Republican: Authentic STEM program receives expanded funding Thank you for subscribing to my updates! I am grateful for the opportunity to serve as your representative in Congress.
The American people see through this partisan charade, which is why they fired Nancy Pelosi once and for all. House Republicans are committed to the truth.

Stefanik, Crawford Introduce Bill To Protect US Agricultural Land From Foreign Adversaries Sun Community News: Stefanik votes to advance bipartisan National Defense bill Watertown Daily Times: National Defense Authorization Act passes House with 4.6% boost to soldier pay WWNY: House passes bill scrapping military COVID vaccine mandate CNY Central: Central New York congressional representatives weigh in on Twitter oversight Times Herald-Record: Three New Yorkers will wield power in Congress in 2023. What will that mean for the state?
